\num{16} (kirxkeTf, biliyaDfsxR, \mo\ ATagaLalilx) ATada saradi; ininxMgfsx; sULu: \eng{they got M.C.Cout for 80 in their second hand} tamamx eraDane ininxMgfsxnalilx avaru eMsisitaMDavanunx keVvala \eng{80}kekx auTf mADidaru. \eng{he has four or five hand to score} sokxVru mADalu avanige nAlekxYdu saradigaLu sikikxdavu.

\num{3} \eng{a} \engit{or} (\ame) \eng{one} \engit{or} (\birx) \eng{the hell of a} \engit{or} \eng{helluva} = \hyperlink{hell nuga17}{?nuga? \((17)\).} 
\num{4} \eng{as hell} tiVra; ati: \eng{tired as hell} tiVra AyAsagoMDu. 
\hypertarget{hell nuga5}{} 
\num{5} \eng{beat the hell out of} cenAnxgi, balavAgi gududx hAku. 
\numi{6} \eng{be hell on} (\ashi): 
\banum
\alnum{a} apirxyavAgi vatiRsu; kaTuvAgi naDeduko; koVpa toVru; noVyisuvaMte vatiRsu: \eng{she's hell on her servants} avaLu ALugaLa bagegx bahaLa kaTuvAgi naDedukoMDaLu.

\eanum
\numie
\num{7} \eng{catch hell} = \hyperlink{hell nuga10}{?nuga? \((10)\).} 
\num{8} \eng{come hell or high water}EneV, eSeTxV aDiDxAtaMkagaLu barali lekikxsade. 
\num{9} \eng{for the hell of it} keVvala vinoVdakAkxgi, tamASegAgi. 
\hypertarget{hell nuga10}{} 
\num{10} \eng{get hell} bayugxLa tinunx; bayiyxsiko; cenAnxgi CiVmAri mADisiko: \eng{he'll get hell from his wife for coming so late again} matetx aSuTx hotAtxgi, hotutx miVri barutitxruvudakAkxgi avana heMDatiyiMda avanu bayiyxsikoLuLxtAtxne. 
\num{11} \eng{give (a person) hell} (yAvudeV vayxkitxge) taDeyalAgada kirukuLa koDu; goVLuguTiTxsu; piVDisu; kATakoDu; sahisalAradaMte mADu. 
\num{12} \eng{go to hell}! hALAgi hoVgu! 
\num{13} \eng{hell and high water} yAvudeV bageya yA parxmANada aDiDxAtaMkagaLu, kaSaTxgaLu, kelxVshagaLu:\eng{led his men through hell and high water} elalx riVtiya kaSaTxgaLalUlx avanu janarige dAri toVridanu. 
\num{14} \eng{hell around} (\ashi) saMyama biTuTx vatiRsu, jiVvisu; hucAcxbaTeTx vatiRsu; poVkariyAgi naDeduko, baduku: \eng{all they cared about was drinking and hell in around} avarige beVkAgidudxdu kuDiyuvudu matutx hucAcxbaTeTx vatiRsuvudu mAtarx. 
\num{15} \eng{hell for} (yAvudAdarU oMdara bagegx) bahaLa kALajiyuLaLx; bahaLa Asakitx, sharxdedhx iruva: \eng{he was hell for efficiency} avanige dakaSxteya bagegx tiVvarx Asakitxyitutx. 
\num{16} \eng{hell for leather} pUtiRveVgadalilx; hucAcxpaTeTx veVgadalilx. 
\hypertarget{hell nuga17}{} 
\numi{17} \eng{hell of a} (\ashi) 
\banum
\alnum{a} cenAnxgilalxda; keTaTx; ahitavAda; saribiVLada; kaSaTxda; parxyAsada: \eng{we had a hell of a trip on that bumpy road} etetxtitx hAkuva A rasetxya meVlina parxvAsa namage bahaLa parxyAsavAyitu.

\alnum{c} tuMba; bahaLa; BAri; ati; vipariVta: \eng{it was a hell of a lot of money for a movie} bariV oMdu calanacitarx noVDalu adu tuMba duDuDx.

\numie
\num{18} \eng{hell to pay} bahaLa kaSaTx; PajiVti; takakx shAsitx: \eng{if he's late there'll be hell to pay} avanu hotutx miVri baMdare avanige bahaLa kaSaTx kAdide. 
\num{19}\eng{knock the hell out of} = \hyperlink{hell nuga5}{?nuga? \((5)\)}. 
\hyperdef{H}{hell nuga(20)}{} 
\numi{20} \eng{like hell} (aneVka veVLe AdhikayxsUcakavAgi): 
\banum
\alnum{a} (\AmA) EnanUnx lakaSxyX mADade; elAlx Ase toredu.

\num{22} \eng{play (merry) hell with} (\ashi) nilaRkaSxyXdiMda vayxvaharisu; toMdareyanunx yA apAyavanunx uMTumADu; avayxvasethxgoLisu; asatxvayxsatxgoLisu: \eng{heavy rains played hell with the flow of traffic} BAri maLeyiMda vAhana saMcAra asatxvayxsatxgoMDitu. 
\numi{23} \eng{raise hell}:

\bentry

\bnum
\num{1} ililx; I -- jAgadalilx, sathxLadalilx, sAthxnadalilx: \eng{put it here} adanunx alilxDu\eng{what is this dog doing here?} I nAyi I jAgadalilx Enu mADutitxde? \eng{has lived here for many years} ililx aneVka vaSaRgaLa kAla vAsamADidAdxne.\eng{comes here every day} parxtinitayx ililxge barutAtxne. 
\num{2} (vayxkitx yA vasutxvina sathxLa toVrisalu vayxkitxyatatx gamana seLeyuvAga) ililxruva; ililxruvaMtha; alilxruva: \eng{my son here will show you} ililxruva nananx maga ninage toVrisutAtxne\eng{here is your coat} ililxde ninanx koVTu. 
\num{3} (saMBASaNe, vAda, GaTane, parisithxti, \mo vugaLalilx) ililx; I -- GaTaTxdalilx, haMtadalilx: \eng{I have a question here} I GaTaTxdalilx nananxdoMdu parxshenxyide\eng{here the speaker paused for a reply} I haMtadalilx BASaNakAranu utatxrakAkxgi mAtu nililxsida. 
\num{4} I -- bALinalilx, janamxdalilx. 
\num{5} I -- parxsAtxvadalilx, viSayadalilx. 
\num{6} I -- sathxLakekx, parxdeVshakekx, jAgakekx; ililxge: \eng{I don't belong here} nAnu ililxge seVridavanalalx; nAnu ililxyavanalalx\eng{come here} bA ililx; I sathxLakekx bA. 
\num{7} (\kanmu\ gamana seLeyuvAga yA parxtiBaTane sUcisuvAga) itatx; I kaDe; ililx: \eng{look here}! noVDililx! ililx noVDu! 
\enum
\emng

\noindent
\gl{\pagu}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} \eng{here and now} idiVgaleV; IgaleV; IgiMdiVgaleV; ilelxV; taDamADade; sAvakAsha mADade; takaSxNaveV; kUDaleV: \eng{we must tend to this matter here and now} nAvu I viSayakekx idiVgaleV gamana koDabeVku. 
\numi{2} \eng{here and there} 
\banum
\alnum{a} alalxlilx; beVrebeVre sathxLagaLalilx; halaveDe; nAnA sathxLagaLalilx: \eng{he worked here and there} avanu beVrebeVre sathxLagaLalilx kelasamADidanu. 
\alnum{b} alilx ililx; ilUlx alUlx: \eng{we went here and there in the darkness} nAvu katatxlalilx alUlxilUlx sutAtxDidevu. 
\eanum
\numie
\num{3} \eng{here below} ililx; ihaloVkadalilx; ihajiVvanadalilx. 
\num{4} \eng{here goes} (\AmA) (oMdu dheYyaRda kelasamADalu toDagidAga mADuva udAgxra) igoV noVDu, Ayitu!: \eng{since it must be done, here goes} idanunx mADaleVbeVkAgiruvudariMda, igoV (noVDu) shurumADiyeVbiTeTx! 
\num{5} \eng{here's a health to} = \hyperlink{health pagu6}{?pagu? \((6)\)}. 
\hypertarget{health pagu6}{} 
\num{6} \eng{here's to} (savxsitxpAna mADuvAga) igoV! savxsitxpAna! 
\num{7} \eng{here, there and everywhere} elelxlUlx; parxtiyoMdu jAgadalilxyU: \eng{we were soon scattered here, there and everywhere} nAvu beVga elalx kaDegU caduridevu. 
\hyperdef{H}{here(1) pagu(8)}{} 
\num{8} \eng{here today, gone tomorrow} ivatitxdadxre nALe ilalx; keVvala kaSxNika; kaSxNaBaMgura; shAshavxtavalalx; sithxravalalx. 
\num{9} \eng{here we go again} (\AmA) (\kanmu\ ahitakaravAda GaTanegaLa \vi) tirugi adeV sithxti; tirugi yathAparxkAra; matetx adeV holasu PajiVti; tirugi shuru Ayatxpapx! tagoV, matetx adeV! matetx adeV pADu. 
\num{10} \eng{here we are}(\AmA) (talupabeVkAda sathxLa talupidAga heVLuvAga) baMdeVbiTeTxvu; baMdiLidevu. 
\num{11} \eng{here you are} (yAvudeV vasutxvanunx obabxrige koDuvAga heVLuva mAtu) idoV tago. 
\hyperdef{H}{here(1) pagu(12)}{} 
\numi{12} \eng{neither here nor there}. 
\banum

\alnum{b} amuKayx; gaNanege barada; lekakxkikxlalxda: \eng{the fact that her family has no money is neither here nor there} avaLa kuTuMbakekx haNavilalxveMba saMgati amuKayx.

\num{13} BUSaNa; gwrava taruva vayxkitx, vasutx: \eng{he is an honour to his profession} avanu tananx vqtitxge BUSaNapArxyavAgidAdxne.

\num{2} (savxlapx) hotutx; veVLe; samaya; (kAlada) alApxvadhi. 
\num{3} (\bava dalilx) kelasada veVLe; kAyaRveVLe; kAyARvadhi; dinacariya kelasa \mo vugaLige nigadi mADida kAla: \eng{office hours are 10 to 5} kaceVriya kelasada veVLe hatutx gaMTeyiMda aidu gaMTeyavarege. 
\num{4} (\Kavi) \eng{$15^\circ$} reVKAMsha. 
\numi{5} (\roVkAyx\ cacuR) (\bava dalilx): 
\banum
\alnum{a} pArxthaRnA -- kAla, samaya; dinadalilx (kerxYsatx) pArxthaRnegAgi gotutx mADiruva ELu hotutxgaLalilx oMdu. 
\alnum{b} kAlika pArxthaRnegaLu; I ELu hotutxgaLalilx mADabeVkAda pArxthaRne. 
\eanum
\numie
\num{6} Iga; vataRmAna; sadayxda, parxkaqta -- kAla: \eng{question of the hour} Igina parxshenx. 
\num{7} gaDiyArada parxkAra gaMTe: \eng{what is the hour?} Iga gaMTe eSuTx? 
\num{8} gaMTedUra; (yAvudeV hiMde heVLida yA parasapxra tiLidiruva vAhanadalilx, yA naDageyalilx) oMdu gaMTeyalilx karxmisida dUra: \eng{we are an hour from Mysore} nAvu meYsUriniMda oMdugaMTe dUradalilxdedxVve. 
\num{9} kAla; gaLige; muhUtaR; sakAla; yAvudeV kelasa \mo vugaLa yA modalAdavugaLige anukUlavAda yA nishacxyisida kAla, hotutx: \eng{the hour has come} (yAvudeV kelasa \mo vugaLige) kAla baMdide; muhUtaR odagide.

\noindent
\gl{\pagu}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} \eng{after hours} kaceVri \mo vu mucicxda meVle; kelasada veVLeya anaMtara. 
\num{2} \eng{a late hour} rAtirx bahaLa hotutx AdameVle. 
\num{3} \eng{bad hours} (malaguva yA ELuva \vi) aveVLe; akAla; sariyalalxda kAla. 
\num{4} \eng{early hours} (malaguva yA ELuva \vi) hotitxge muMce. 
\num{5} \eng{evil hour} keTaTx gaLige; duradaqSaTx, apaGAta, hAni, \mo vugaLa kAla. 
\num{6} \eng{good hours} (malaguva yA ELuva \vi) sakAla; sariyAda -- veVLe, kAla. 
\num{7} \eng{in a good hour} oLeLxya hotitxnalilx; sudeYvadiMda. 
\num{8} \eng{in an evil hour} keTaTx hotitxnalilx; viSagaLigeyalilx; dudeYRvadiMda. 
\num{9} \eng{late hours} (malaguva yA ELuva \vi) hotAtxgi; hotutx, veVLe, kAla -- miVri. 
\num{10} \eng{regular hours} (malaguva yA ELuva \vi) niyatavAda hotutx; kulxpatx kAla, veVLe. 
\num{11} \eng{small hours} rAtirxya sarihotutx; madhayxrAtirxyAda meVle \eng{1, 2,} \mo\ gaMTegaLu. 
\num{12} \eng{the hour} gaDiyArada gaMTe; gaDiyAradalilx gurutu hAkiruva yAvudeV gaMTe: \eng{bus leaves on the hour} basusx gaMTege, nigadiyAda hotitxge sariyAgi horaDutatxde.

\bentry
\word[how(1)]{how}
\pron{hw}
\gl{\kirxvi}
\bmng
\bnum
\numi{1} (parxshAnxthaRkavAgi) 
\banum
\alnum{a} heVge; yAva riVti; eMtu: \eng{how does he do it?} avanadanunx heVge mADutAtxne? \eng{ask him how he does it} avanadanunx heVge mADutAneMdu keVLu. 
\alnum{b} (AdhikAyxthaR sUcisuvalilx) heVge tAne? : \eng{how in the world can one do such a task?} aMtha oMdu kelasavanunx iDiV loVkadalilx heVge tAne mADalu sAdhayx? 
\eanum
\numie
\num{2} (paroVkaSx varadiya heVLikeyalilx AlaMkArikavAgi yA sAmAnayx parxyoVgavAgi) heVge -- eMbudAgi, eMdu, aMta: \eng{told us how God was almighty} deVvaru heVge savaRshakatx eMbudanunx tiLisida. 
\num{3} (parxshenxyalilx) eSuTx? eSuTx maTiTxge? eSuTx dUra? eSoTxMdu? heVge? \eng{how far is it?} eSuTx dUra ide adu? 
\num{4} (AshacxyaRda udAgxravAgi) eSoTxMdu! heVge! \eng{how far it is} adu eSoTxMdu dUravide! \eng{how he snores}! avanu heVge, eSoTxMdu gorake hoDeyutAtxne! 
\numi{5} (adhiVnavAkayxdalilx saMbaMdha sUcaka padavAgi) 
\banum
\alnum{a} heVgAdarU; heVgoV; yAvudeV riVtiyalAlxdarU: \eng{do it how you can} adanunx heVgAdarU mADu. 
\alnum{b} hAge; aMte: \eng{do it how can} ninage baMdaMte, AdaMte mADu. 
\eanum
\numie
\num{6} yAva sithxtiyalilx?: \eng{how are you?} niVnu heVgididxVya? ninanx sithxti heVgide? 
\enum
\emng

\noindent
\gl{\nuga}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} \eng{and how}! (\kanmu\ vayxMgayxdalilx ilalxve AdhikAyxthaRdalilx) aSaTxlalxde! KaMDitavAgi: \eng{am I happy? and how}! nAnu suKavAgidedxVneye aMtalalxveV (niVnu keVLidudx)? aSaTxlalxde! 
\num{2} \eng{here is how}! (savxsitxpAna mADuvalilx) igoV, nimamx AroVgayx BAgayxkAkxgi! 
\numi{3} \eng{how about} 
\banum
\alnum{a} -re heVge? ninage iSaTxveV? \eng{how about a game of chess} oMdu ATa caduraMgadATa ADidare heVge? 
\alnum{b} adara bagegx Enu mADabeVku? 
\alnum{c} adara bagegx Enu samAcAra? 
\eanum
\numie
\numi{4} \eng{how are you?} 
\banum
\alnum{a} heVgididxVye? AroVgayxvAgididxVyA? deVhasithxti heVgide? 
\hypertarget{how nuga4b}{} 
\alnum{b} (BeVTiyAdAga yA paricaya mADidAga keVvala sAMparxdAyikavAgi ADuva mAtAgi) heVgididxVri? cenAnxgididxVrA? keSxVmaveV? kushalavaSeTx? 
\eanum
\numie
\num{5} \eng{how come} (\AmA) adu heVge saMBavisitu? adu heVge sAdhayx? 
\num{6} \eng{how do?} = \hyperlink{how nuga4b}{?nuga? \(4(b)\)}. 
\num{7} \eng{how do you do?} = \hyperlink{how nuga4b}{?nuga? \(4(b)\)}. 
\num{8} \eng{how is corn?} dhAyxna(da dhAraNe) heVgide? 
\num{9} \eng{how is that for high} (\AmA) (keVLuvavanu AshacxyaRpaDuvaMte mADalu) dubAri belege idakikxMta beVkeV? 
\numi{10} \eng{how much?} 
\banum
\alnum{a} eSuTx bele adakekx? 
\alnum{b} eSuTx haNa?: \eng{how much do I owe you?} nAnu ninage eSuTx haNa koDabeVku? 
\alnum{c} (\hA) (obabxnu heVLida mAtanunx punaH heVLeMdu koVruvAga): \eng{``he plays the saxtuba", plays the saxtuba, how much?} ``avanu sAYxkfsxTUyxbAvAdana mADutAtxne"`` Enu vAdana mADutAtxne?'' 
\eanum
\numie
\num{11} \eng{how now?} (\pArxparx) Enu hAgeMdare? adara athaR Enu? 
\num{12} \eng{how on earth etc} = \hyperlink{how nuga16}{?nuga? \((16)\)}. 
\num{13} \eng{how so?} adu heVge? adu hAgeMdu heVge heVLutitxye? adu heVgAgutatxde, toVrisu noVDoVNa. 
\numi{14} \eng{how's that?} 
\banum
\alnum{a} adara bagegx ninanx aBipArxya yA vivaraNe Enu? adara bagegx niVnu Enu heVLutitxye? 
\alnum{b} (kirxkeTf) (ATagAranu aMpeYranunx keVLuva parxshenxyAgi) heVge? Enu? bAYxTugAra auTAdanoV ilalxvoV? 
\eanum
\numie
\num{15} \eng{how that for queer}? vicitarx enunxvudakekx idakikxMta beVkeV? idu sAlade? 
\hypertarget{how nuga16}{} 
\num{16} \eng{how the deuce (}\engit{or} \eng{devil}, \engit{or} \eng{dickens)} heVge tAne?
